That was pretty neat looking(geek)

Frank Sumption <purplealiengirl@...> wrote:          http://quazar.home.insightbb.com/AM/index.html
 
 This is a guy that makes transistior radios, at the bottom of the page is link, "AM and FM one", click on that and it shows a video of him manually tuning the radio. You'd have to be geek to think it was cool---like I did. 
 
 Frank-S
